column5: I wish you luck on getting to 20,000.  Give it what, another week or less?  Bet's?  I say on or before Nov. 8 he hit's 20,000 fans.
no takers on a friendly bet?  I still say Nov 8.  Update: 19,517 People Like This
I take it this is a facebook or tweeter thing you are speaking of
Initially when I saw the title of the thread, I thought Dave Mercer ate 19,381 subway sandwiches.LOL
Yes Terry, it's how many people have joined his fan page on facebook.
is it the closest to it without going over??????? i will take nov 9th
I say he's there by sat and that would be the 6th?
correct, Sat.  I just have to go with 8th as it's a special day for me...
Well I know he's at "20,011 People Like This" but not sure when he hit the number...
at around 9 o'clock last night he was about 50 away so my guess would be overnight last night or this morning?
I'm going with this morning so I win...
